resources.string: This is the main game screen which represents one day of stock trading. Use this screen to buy and sell stocks, withdraw or deposit money to/from the bank, and pay off debt.

Welcome to Stock Wars! This game is based on stock market trading. In order to play, you must buy stocks at the lowest possible prices and sell them at the highest possible prices. Pressing the \"Advance\" button advances the game by one day and changes the prices of the stocks. Keep doing this until the game ends and see how much you have earned!
Welcome to Chafe bank, From here you can make deposits, withdrawals and pay off your debt!
Congratulations! You have completed Stock Wars. Let\'s see how you did...
In order to view this stock\'s price history, you must purchase the Stock Broker trading boost from the Trading Boosts section.
The company has just released a major product and people absolutely love it! Their stock price just took a huge jump!

The board of directors of this company has decided it is time for a change. The CEO has just been terminated! This sudden change in corporate governance has shaken investors\' confidence in the company. Stock prices fall greatly!
The company has just started a major ad campaign across the country, bringing in a multitude of new customers. Stock price quickly climbs!
The company has just recalled their biggest product! One million units are faulty and have made the lives of many people very difficult... Stock price plummets!
The company has just opened up another corporate office in a new city! This expansion is surely a good sign and has investors very optimistic about their future. Stock price rises fast!
The company has just been defeated in a very big legal battle. Losses due to this lawsuit are staggering. The company\'s stock takes a huge dive!
